articles.title: Windows won't take screenshots of everything you do after all — unless you opt in - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is making its controversial AI-powered Recall feature optional. The changes come after security experts warned the feature could be a disaster for cybersecurity.

articles.title: Chang'e 6 probe's far-side moon samples enter return-to-Earth module in lunar orbit, China says - Space.com
articles.description: The Chang'e 6 mission's two spacecraft docked on Thursday (June 6) in lunar orbit. Samples of the moon's far side were transferred for return to Earth.
articles.content: China's Chang'e 6 mission continues to make history, having collected the first samples ever retrieved from the far side of the moon and now transferring those samples between spacecraft in orbit. Th… [+4367 chars]
